display_name: Rutter Childrens Behaviour Questionnaire (RCBQ): Do you often get into a violent rage?
description:
Item from the Rutter Childrens Behaviour Questionnaire (RCBQ).[Rutter M., 1967 (PubMed ID: 6033260)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/6033260/)

[Search for all Rutter Childrens Behaviour Questionnaire variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/sandd/variables?search=rcbq)

Original text: This question asks about your general well-being over the LAST 2 WEEKS. Please check only one answer (YES or NO) for each item.
